Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Requires that in the event a complaint made to local code enforcement results in the issuance of a compliance order, the complainant shall also be provided a copy of such order
Summary: Requires that when a complaint is made to local code enforcement of a violation of the uniform fire prevention and building code or a local code which results in the issuance of a compliance order, the complainant shall also be provided a copy of such order.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring that when a complaint is made to local code enforcement of a violation of the uniform fire prevention and building code or local building codes which results in the issuance of a compliance order, the complainant shall also be provided a copy of such order
